first.title: Goal-Oriented
first.description: When there is clear goal, the instruments for achieving it is easily found. The orientation on the goal, the results comes faster.

second.title: Discipline
second.description: Discipline and consistency come together. Achieving results with them is very easy.

third.title: Focus
third.description: One of the most important skill for achieving results. Deepening on the solution of some task require focus/concentration.
